  object qPresMate: TQuery
    CachedUpdates = True
    DatabaseName = 'BaseDato'
    SQL.Strings = (
      'SELECT *  FROM  MATERIALESSA')
    Left = 245
    Top = 190
    object qPresMateCODIGOMATERIAL: TFloatField
      FieldName = 'CODIGOMATERIAL'
      Origin = 'MATERIALESSA.CODIGOMATERIAL'
    end
    object qPresMateNOMBREMATERIAL: TStringField

    end
    object qPresMateCODIGOUNIDAD: TStringField
      FieldName = 'CODIGOUNIDAD'
      Origin = 'MATERIALESSA.CODIGOUNIDAD'
      Size = 2
    end
  end
